name: Channel BS
description:
“Only when the last tree has been cut down, the last fish been caught, and the last stream poisoned, will we realize we cannot eat money.”

--------------------------------

'Channel BS' is a short conceptual game, developed as part of the 'Game-A-Week' module of our bachelor degree in Game Design. It was developed throughout (less than) a week.

The given theme was 'destroy'. 

Credits 

'Channel BS' was made by Mylene Ben Osman and Martina Marchio. 

We'd also like to thank Martin Bremer for his coding help ❤︎

 Additional assets: 

Lamps

Skyboxes

Lock

 This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. 

 Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai 

"Game-A-Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
